text:
="preserve">Uriah Adolphus Ashley Maclean (1 February 1944 – 25 November 2020) was a Panamanian Roman Catholic bishop. Ashley Maclean was born in Panama City. He was ordained to the priesthood in 1979. He was bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Penonomé, Panama, from 1993 to 2015. He then was titular bishop of "Agbia" and auxiliary bishop of the Roman Catholic Archdiocese of Panama, Panama, from 2015 to 2019.
Ashley Maclean died in Panama City on 25 November 2020 at the age of 76.
